title: Coping with the Challenges of Motherhood
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Sarah Parshall Perry
itunes:summary:
Parenting is rewarding, but it can also be exhausting. John and Danny encourage moms to persevere in motherhood.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Sarah Parshall Perry's book "Mommy Needs a Raise" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-19?refcd=1044803

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/coping-with-the-challenges-of-motherhood/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
